dcterms:description: The dataset is used for the CoNLL-SIGMORPHON 2017 Shared Task on Universal Morphological Reinﬂection, focusing on morphological reinflection across 52 languages.
dcterms:title: CoNLL-SIGMORPHON 2017 Shared Task Dataset

dcterms:description: The dataset is used for the SIGMORPHON 2016 shared task on morphological reinflection, providing a benchmark for evaluating morphological models.
dcterms:title: CoNLL-SIGMORPHON 2016 Shared Task Dataset

dcterms:description: The dataset consists of the first million lines of the Wikipedia dumps, used for training language models in the context of morphological reinflection.
dcterms:title: Wikipedia Corpus
